short_summary: An electronic torque tester and transducer are needed
full_summary:
# Electronic Torque Tester and Transducer Request for Proposal

### Title

Electronic Torque Tester and Transducer

### Reference Number

cb-5786-38664521

### Solicitation Number

W8486-238801/A

### Amendment Number

3

### Notice Issuance Date

2023-05-23

### Tender Closing Date and Time

2023-06-16T14:00:00

### Attachment

Note: The original attachments were not included here due to character limitations (it won't fit).

### Contract Overview

**Notice Type**

Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**

Competitive - Open bidding

**Procurement Category**

Goods and services

**Trade Agreements**

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**

World

### Services/Supplies Required

The Department of National Defence seeks to provide the following items to 25 CFSD Montreal Receipts Section, 6363 rue Notre Dame St. E Montreal, QC H1N3V9 by September 30, 2023.

**Item 1: Electronic Torque Tester**

Supply a Snap-On Electronic Torque Tester, Part Number VERSATEST or equivalent, NSN 6635-20-0015641. Quantity is 6, with each item delivered separately.

**Item 2: Transducer, Motional Pickup**

Supply a Snap-On Transducer, Motional Pickup, Part Number TTC12 or equivalent, NSN 6695-01-4565281. Quantity is 6, with each item delivered separately.

**Item 3: Transducer, Motional Pickup**

Supply a Snap-On Transducer, Motional Pickup, Part Number TTC400 or equivalent, NSN 6695-20-0015662. Quantity is 6, with each item delivered separately.

### Submission Requirements

Bidders must provide detailed information on the products proposed to include brand names, model numbers, and NSN numbers.

Documentation may be submitted in either English or French.

Note: This is a preferential notice for Canadian goods and services, and the Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers.

For questions or further information, please contact:

Justin Laundrie
[justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca)
(343) 571-8929

Attachments available at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).  •
